links.title: Hard Truth Behind Tesla Bears
links.description: In our previous blog, we reviewed just how compelling the vision of Tesla is and how growth could be the most significant factor in deciding their future projections. Now we will dig into the biggest bears of the stock, and why they publicly scrutinize Tesla, the truth may surprise you.

messages.body: Some of the Worst Decliners of the 300 Pt $QQQ Selloff http://bit.ly/2A3ROYR $ADBE $AMD $CRM $NVDA $ADSK $INTU $AMZN $NFLX $FB $AAPL $GOOG

links.title: Tech Stocks Just Took a Serious Beating -- Here Are Some of the Worst Decliners
links.description: Amid broader market jitters tied to rising interest rates, tech stocks took a serious pounding on Wednesday, with losses accelerating as the market neared its close. The tech-heavy Nasdaq fell more than 4%, while The Dow Jones Industrial Average tumbled more than 830 points and the S&P 500 lost more than 90 points.
